rules.title: Respect All Members
rules.description: Treat every member with kindness, respect, and dignity. No discrimination based on race, ethnicity, nationality, religion, gender, sexual orientation, age, or disability.
rules.consequence: Warning, temporary mute, or ban depending on severity

rules.title: No Hate Speech or Harassment
rules.description: Absolutely no hate speech, harassment, bullying, or targeted abuse. This includes slurs, threats, and any form of intimidation.
rules.consequence: Immediate ban with possibility of appeal

rules.title: Be 13+ Years Old
rules.description: You must be at least 13 years old to join this server, as per Discord's Terms of Service. Lying about your age will result in immediate removal.

rules.title: No Impersonation
rules.description: Do not impersonate staff members, other users, or any public figures. This includes using similar usernames, avatars, or claiming to be someone you're not.

rules.title: No Advertising or Self-Promotion
rules.description: No advertising, self-promotion, or spam without permission from staff. This includes Discord invites, social media links, and business promotions.

rules.title: Follow Discord ToS
rules.description: All Discord Terms of Service and Community Guidelines must be followed. Violating Discord's ToS will result in immediate action.
rules.consequence: Immediate ban and report to Discord

rules.title: No Drama or Toxicity
rules.description: Keep the community positive. No drama, unnecessary arguments, or toxic behavior that ruins the experience for others.

rules.title: Use Appropriate Channels
rules.description: Post content in the correct channels. Gaming discussions go in gaming channels, general chat in general channels, etc.

rules.title: No Spam or Flooding
rules.description: No rapid-fire messages, repeated content, or excessive use of caps, emojis, or special characters that disrupt chat flow.

rules.title: No Inappropriate Language
rules.description: Keep language family-friendly. No excessive cursing, vulgar language, or inappropriate jokes that make others uncomfortable.

rules.title: No Political or Religious Debates
rules.description: Avoid heated political or religious discussions that can cause arguments and division in the community.

rules.title: No Personal Information
rules.description: Do not share personal information about yourself or others, including phone numbers, addresses, real names, or private details.
rules.consequence: Message deletion, warning, and possible ban

rules.title: No Begging or Scamming
rules.description: No begging for money, items, or favors. No scams, phishing attempts, or attempts to deceive other members.

rules.title: Respect Language Preferences
rules.description: This is a Bangla and English community. Feel free to use either language, but be respectful of others' language preferences.

rules.title: No Chain Messages or Copy-Pasta
rules.description: No chain messages, copy-pasta, or viral content that encourages spam or disrupts normal conversation.

rules.title: No Cheating or Hacking Discussion
rules.description: Do not discuss, promote, or share information about cheats, hacks, exploits, or any unfair gaming practices.

rules.title: Be a Good Teammate
rules.description: In team games, be supportive and helpful. No toxic behavior, blaming teammates, or intentionally throwing games.
rules.consequence: Warning and temporary voice channel ban

rules.title: No Game Spoilers
rules.description: Do not spoil games, movies, or TV shows for others without warning. Use spoiler tags when discussing recent releases.

rules.title: Respect Gaming Skill Levels
rules.description: Be patient with new players and respect different skill levels. No mocking or belittling others for their gaming abilities.

rules.title: No Gaming Account Trading
rules.description: No trading, selling, or sharing gaming accounts, as this often violates game terms of service and can be unsafe.

rules.title: Use LFG Channels Properly
rules.description: When looking for groups, be clear about your requirements, skill level, and availability. No spamming LFG requests.

rules.title: Respect Event Rules
rules.description: Follow all specific rules for community events, tournaments, and activities. Event organizers' decisions are final.

rules.title: No Event Disruption
rules.description: Do not intentionally disrupt or sabotage community events, tournaments, or activities.
rules.consequence: Temporary ban and removal from future events

rules.title: Be Punctual for Events
rules.description: If you sign up for an event, be on time and communicate if you need to cancel or will be late.
rules.consequence: Warning and possible removal from future events

rules.title: No Event Cheating
rules.description: No cheating, exploiting, or unfair advantages during community tournaments or competitive events.

rules.title: Respect Staff Decisions
rules.description: Staff decisions are final. Arguing with moderators publicly will result in additional consequences.
rules.consequence: Warning and possible escalation of punishment

rules.title: No Moderation Evasion
rules.description: Do not attempt to evade moderation actions by creating alt accounts, using VPNs, or other methods.

rules.title: Appeal Process
rules.description: If you believe a moderation action was unfair, contact a staff member privately. Public appeals will be ignored.

rules.title: No Staff Harassment
rules.description: Do not harass, threaten, or repeatedly message staff members. This will result in immediate action.

rules.title: No Doxxing
rules.description: Never share or threaten to share someone's personal information, including real name, address, phone number, or workplace.
rules.consequence: Immediate permanent ban and report to Discord

rules.title: No Threats or Violence
rules.description: No threats of violence, harm, or any form of intimidation against other members or their property.
rules.consequence: Immediate permanent ban and possible legal action

rules.title: Report Suspicious Behavior
rules.description: If you see suspicious behavior, harassment, or rule violations, report it to staff immediately. Do not confront rule breakers yourself.
rules.consequence: Thank you for helping keep the community safe

rules.title: No Stalking or Harassment
rules.description: Do not follow, stalk, or repeatedly contact members who have asked you to stop or who are clearly uncomfortable.
rules.consequence: Warning, temporary ban, or permanent ban

rules.title: No NSFW Content
rules.description: No pornographic, sexually explicit, or inappropriate content. This includes images, videos, links, and text.
rules.consequence: Immediate ban and report to Discord

rules.title: No Gore or Violence
rules.description: No graphic violence, gore, or disturbing content that could upset or traumatize other members.

rules.title: Respect Copyright
rules.description: Do not share copyrighted content without permission. This includes music, videos, images, and other media.

rules.title: No Malicious Links
rules.description: Do not share links to malicious websites, scams, or content that could harm other users' devices.

rules.title: Appropriate Profile Pictures
rules.description: Keep profile pictures and usernames appropriate and family-friendly. No offensive, sexual, or inappropriate content.

rules.title: No Voice Channel Disruption
rules.description: Do not intentionally disrupt voice channels with loud noises, music, or other audio that annoys other users.

rules.title: Use Push-to-Talk When Appropriate
rules.description: Use push-to-talk in busy voice channels to avoid background noise and echo. Follow channel-specific rules.

rules.title: No Voice Chat Recording
rules.description: Do not record voice conversations without explicit permission from all participants.

rules.title: Respect Voice Channel Purpose
rules.description: Use voice channels for their intended purpose. Gaming channels for gaming, music channels for music, etc.

rules.title: No Voice Channel Hopping
rules.description: Do not rapidly join and leave voice channels repeatedly, as this can be disruptive and annoying.

rules.title: No Inappropriate Voice Content
rules.description: Keep voice chat appropriate and family-friendly. No inappropriate language, sounds, or content.

rules.title: No Exploiting Loopholes
rules.description: Do not try to find loopholes in the rules or exploit technicalities. The spirit of the rules matters more than the letter.

rules.title: Be Patient with New Members
rules.description: Welcome new members and help them understand the community. Be patient and helpful rather than dismissive.

rules.title: Report Bugs and Issues
rules.description: If you find bugs, issues, or problems with the server, report them to staff rather than exploiting them.
rules.consequence: Thank you for helping improve the server

rules.title: No Backseat Gaming
rules.description: Unless asked, do not give unsolicited advice or criticism about how someone is playing a game.

rules.title: Use Threads for Long Discussions
rules.description: For long discussions or detailed conversations, use threads to keep channels organized and readable.

rules.title: No Game Account Sharing
rules.description: Do not share your gaming account credentials with others, as this can lead to account theft and violates most game ToS.

rules.title: Respect Game-Specific Rules
rules.description: Follow the rules and guidelines of the specific games you're playing, especially in competitive modes.

rules.title: Participate Actively
rules.description: When joining events, participate actively and engage with the community. Don't just lurk without contributing.

rules.title: Respect Event Schedules
rules.description: Be aware of event schedules and time zones. Don't demand events be rescheduled for your convenience.

rules.title: No Catfishing or Deception
rules.description: Do not pretend to be someone you're not, use fake photos, or deceive others about your identity.

rules.title: Be Cautious with Personal Info
rules.description: Be careful about sharing personal information, even in private messages. Not everyone has good intentions.

rules.title: No Excessive Selfies
rules.description: While occasional selfies are fine, don't spam the chat with excessive photos of yourself.

rules.title: Use Spoiler Tags
rules.description: Use spoiler tags when discussing plot points, endings, or major events from recent games, movies, or shows.

rules.title: No Background Noise
rules.description: Minimize background noise in voice channels. Use noise suppression and keep your microphone away from loud sources.

rules.title: Respect Voice Channel Limits
rules.description: Do not exceed voice channel user limits or try to bypass restrictions.

settings.contactModerators: If you have questions about these rules or need to report an issue, please contact a moderator or use the #modmail channel.
settings.ruleChanges: These rules may be updated periodically. Major changes will be announced in #announcements. Continued participation in the server indicates acceptance of these rules.
